title: Sound Bug with Kalista
body:
So basically, when you spawn you hear Kalista babble on about some sh*t even if you're on the other team and she is at the other end of the map. I just figured rito would want to fix this, because you know, they pride themselves on a polished game. 

I've only noticed it on ARAM, but that's probably because Kalista isn't used often when I play in norms.

replies.body: Oh no, this was intended. Remember, Kalista is actually a horse whisperer?
